ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:1.2_0: At that time the nun Thullanandā gave the full admission to the trainee nun Caṇḍakāḷī, who was socializing with men and boys, and who was temperamental and difficult to live with.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:1.3_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:1.4_0: “How could Venerable Thullanandā give the full admission to the trainee nun Caṇḍakāḷī, who is socializing with men and boys, and who is temperamental and difficult to live with?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:1.5_0: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā did this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:1.8_0: “... How could the nun Thullanandā do this?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:1.9_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:1.10_0: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:1.11.1_0: ‘If a nun gives the full admission to a trainee nun who is socializing with men and boys and who is temperamental and difficult to live with, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:2.1.4_0: ...The nun who has been given the full ordination by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:2.1.6_0: those who have reached twenty years of age.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:2.1.8_0: those who have not reached twenty years of age.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:2.1.10_0: Don’t rely on bodily and verbal action?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:2.1.14_0: she causes suffering to others, and grieves herself.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:2.1.16_0: one training for two years in the six rules.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:2.1.19_0: If, intending to give full admission, she searches for a group, a teacher, a bowl, or a robe, or she establishes a monastic boundary, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:2.1.20_0: After the motion, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:2.1.21_0: After each of the first two announcements, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:2.1.22_0: When the last announcement is finished, the preceptor commits an offense entailing confession,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:2.1.23_0: and the group and the teacher commit an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:2.2.1_0: there is no offense for him.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:2.2.2_0: if she gives her the full admission without knowing that she is a criminal;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:2.2.4_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:2.2.5_0: The ninth training rule is finished.
